alert.note: Alert for Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore County through 730 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout over Dumas, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dumas. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
